content: each petal is carefully shaped to give a realistic blooming effect the rose is surrounded by delicate green leaves giving it a bouquet-like appearance perfect for holding cups mugs or small bowls without scratching surfaces the thick sturdy stitching ensures durability and long-lasting use the coaster s flat base ensures cups sit securely without tipping handmade with care every piece has its own unique charm available in multiple rose colors to suit different styles adds a cozy handmade touch to both modern and traditional homes can also be used as a mini decorative doily under vases or candles the yarn used is washable making it easy to clean and reuse
